page.title: 11A CHILD'S DAY
page.content:
A day in the life of a child of 14 yrs. {NAME:}Natalie Ann Hodson. {ADDRESS:}92 Linden Grove, Salford 5 {FAMILY:}Mam, Dad, Brother. {SCHOOL:}Cathedral R.C. High School. {RELIGION:}Roman Catholic.
On a Sunday, my mam usually shouts me at about 8.30a.m. It is then a mad dash to wash, dress and have a cup of tea-before going to church for the 9.00 a.m. mass. At about 8.55a.m., my mam, brother and I, leave for church. It is only down the street, so we arrive at church for 9.00 a.m. We meet my gran in church and sit with her during the mass. Church finishes at about 9.45 a.m. and we go home. When we get home my mam makes us a
